summary: This bill, S. 2881, concerns the transfer of administrative jurisdiction over specific federal land in Tuolumne County, California. It transfers approximately 160 acres of National Forest System land to the Secretary of the Interior for management as part of Yosemite National Park, and approximately 170 acres of National Park System land to the Secretary of Agriculture for management within Stanislaus National Forest. The bill also addresses potential hazardous substance cleanup responsibilities, allows for minor land adjustments, and clarifies the effect on existing rights and authorizations.
